description: The page items collection, which can be used to process all page items in a container (such as a document, page, or group), regardless of type.

properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.
properties.name: length

methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the PageItem.
methods.name: count

methods.description: Returns the PageItem with the specified index or name.

parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: index

methods.name: item

methods.description: Returns the PageItem with the specified name.
methods.name: itemByName

methods.description: Returns the PageItem with the specified ID.
methods.name: itemByID

methods.description: Returns the PageItems within the specified range.

parameters.description: The PageItem, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: PageItem, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: The PageItem, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: PageItem, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: to

methods.name: itemByRange

methods.description: Returns the first PageItem in the collection.
methods.name: firstItem

methods.description: Returns the last PageItem in the collection.
methods.name: lastItem

methods.description: Returns the middle PageItem in the collection.
methods.name: middleItem

methods.description: Returns the PageItem with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.description: The index of the PageItem that follows the desired PageItem.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: previousItem

methods.description: Returns the PageItem whose index follows the specified PageItem in the collection.

parameters.description: The PageItem whose index comes before the desired PageItem.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: nextItem

methods.description: Returns any PageItem in the collection.
methods.name: anyItem

methods.description: Returns every PageItem in the collection.
methods.name: everyItem

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the PageItem.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Returns the PageItem with the specified index.

name: PageItems
